Pre-Game Insights: India is expected to use the final T20I as an opportunity to fine-tune their strategies and test their bench strength.
Afghanistan will be looking to regroup and deliver a strong performance in the last T20I.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The M. Chinnaswamy Stadium is famed for its compact dimensions, offering a paradise for batters.
Seam bowlers frequently encounter difficulties on this ground, given that the ball tends to favor the batters when it comes off the surface.
Others: The match in Bengaluru is likely to witness a few changes in the playing XI, allowing the management to provide opportunities to players who have been on the sidelines.
